TEXT: The applicant , PERSON PERSON , is a NORP national , who was born in DATE and lives in GPE , GPE . He is represented before the ORG by Mr B. Posavčić , a lawyer practising in PERSON .
The applicant has been a police officer in the service of ORG since DATE .

On DATE he was transferred to perform his duties in PERSON , a town situated in an area previously affected by the Homeland War and classified as an “ area of special state care ” . According to LAW Zakon o područjima od posebne državne skrbi ; “ the LAW ” ) , civil servants performing their duties in these areas had a right to a PERCENT salary increase .

As he did not receive a salary increase , on DATE the applicant filed a civil action with ORG , seeking payment of the amounts due . On DATE ORG declared that it lacked competence to deal with the matter .
On DATE ORG dismissed the applicant 's appeal .

On DATE ORG partially quashed the first and the second instance judgments , and remitted the case to ORG . It found that a part of the applicant 's case fell within the competence of the civil courts .

In the meantime , on DATE ORG enacted LAW Zakon o izmjenama i dopunama zakona o područjima od posebne državne skrbi ; “ the LAW ” ) . The LAW provided that salary increases should only be payable to civil servants who , inter alia , both performed their duties and resided in the areas of special state care .
In the resumed proceedings , on DATE ORG dismissed the applicant 's action , as he did not reside in the area of special state care .
On DATE ORG upheld the first instance judgment and dismissed the applicant 's appeal . On DATE ORG dismissed his request for revision on points of law as inadmissible .
The applicant filed a constitutional complaint . On DATE ORG ( Ustavni sud PERSON ) dismissed his complaint as being lodged outside the statutory time - limit .

The relevant part of LAW ( Zakon o područjima od posebne državne skrbi , ORG no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL ) provides that all civil servants in service with the state administrative bodies in those areas shall receive a PERCENT salary increase in comparison with the salaries in other parts of the ORG .
The relevant part of the LAW to LAW ( Zakon o izmjenama i dopunama zakona o područjima od posebne državne skrbi , ORG no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL ) reads as follows :
“ Natural persons who are domiciled and reside within the areas of special state care .... shall have the rights arising out of this LAW . ”
“ Proceedings to pursue rights arising out of this LAW lodged before DATE of the entry into force of this Act shall be concluded pursuant to the provisions of this Act . ”
